title: Computer Graphics Primer - Mitchell Waite
description:
This book shows how to create your own video graphics and is oriented toward the Radio Shack TRS-80, The Commodore PET 2001, and the Apple II home computers. It is geared to the user who wants to know the concepts and techniques for drawing pictures, making graphs and charts, animating shapes and objects, creating mandalas and dazzlers, and just about any application of the visual arts that you can imagine.




Details

    Author: Mitchell Waite
    Pages: 184 pages
    Publisher: Sams Technical Publishing; 1st edition (August 1980)
    Language: English
    ISBN-10: 0672216507
    ISBN-13: 978-0672216503
